patthana15.48:1.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
